sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Box, Card, Typography, CardActions, CardContent, Button, Modal } from '@mui/material'; const bull = ( â€¢ ); const Store = () => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const handleOpen = () => setOpen(true); const handleClose = () => setOpen(false); return ( Store {[...Array(3)].map((_, index) => ( Essentials Sofa A cozy, three-seater sofa with soft cushions, a sturdy frame, and plush fabric upholstery, perfect for relaxing or entertaining in any living space. ))} {/* Modal */} Confirm Payment ); }; export default Store;
